titleStmt.title: Act for visitation of universities, colledges and schools. At Edinburgh, the fourth day of July, one thousand six hundred and ninety years.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Th. Burnet, Cls. Reg.
Act requiring professors and teachers to subscribe to the Confession of Faith.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
